issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Mapreduce needs to be changed to use the yarn-client module added via YARN-29.
fields.summary: Change MapReduce to use the yarn-client module

comments.body: MR part of the patch from YARN-29.

+1 overall.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12542180/MAPREDUCE-4580-20120823.txt
  against trunk revision .

    +1 @author.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    +1 tests included.  The patch appears to include 3 new or modified test files.

    +1 javac.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    +1 javadoc.  The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

    +1 eclipse:eclipse.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    +1 findbugs.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

    +1 release audit.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    +1 core tests.  The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-common hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-jobclient.

    +1 contrib tests.  The patch passed contrib unit tests.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/2776//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/2776//console

This message is automatically generated.
Committed to trunk, branch-2 and branch-2.1.0. Thanks Vinod.

Integrated in Hadoop-Mapreduce-trunk-Commit #2674 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Mapreduce-trunk-Commit/2674/])
    MAPREDUCE-4580. Change MapReduce to use the yarn-client module. (Contributed by Vinod Kumar Vavilapalli) (Revision 1377922)

     Result = FAILURE
